Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Kevin T OBrien
Reviews.Content: Does everything I wanted and better than I expected! Light weight and takes great pictures to boot. I can't believe how well the auto focus works even on close-ups!

Reviews.Title: Fantastic-That's Why I Always Buy Canon!
Reviews.Author: CoolGramma
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera, just as I expect from Canon, and all the little extras that came with it are fantastic.  I could have paid the same for the camera alone, but this was a great package, all of it useful.  I am going to really enjoy this Canon Powershot camera.  I was not disappointed and you won't be either!

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: NorthernDixi
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! Its absolutely great for the price. The picture quality is awesome even for moving shots and its small enough it fits right in your pocket.

Reviews.Title: Nice set.
Reviews.Author: Heather E. Morrison
Reviews.Content: Bought this as a birthday present for a kid who loves taking pictures and videos and putting them up online.  Everything is included and is a perfect starter set.

Reviews.Title: Smile!!
Reviews.Author: gigi4943
Reviews.Content: Great camera bundle!! Fantastic camera with great accessories!! Pictures are great and colors are so vivid. Item as described. Great everything!!! Highly recommend!! A++++

Reviews.Title: I love this camera.
Reviews.Author: Maria
Reviews.Content: I really enjoy this camera. I brought it for blogging and "vlogging" purposes and it definitely gets the job done.

Reviews.Title: Very Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Donna Ohl
Reviews.Content: I'm not a real "teckie" person, so didn't want something so complicated I couldn't figure it out.  This little camera is great - got it going right away - takes great pictures - and small enough to fit in my purse or pocket.  I would recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Very convenient.
Reviews.Author: alienshape
Reviews.Content: I really like the size and portability of this camera. I found the price to be better than comparable cameras. I originally bought it for work and now it goes almost everywhere with me. All of the accessories are great too. I got the kit mainly because of the extra battery and case. It is a deal well worth it.

Reviews.Title: Great package!
Reviews.Author: Veterans Flag Depot
Reviews.Content: Arrived promptly with good packaging. Took this on my vacation last week and performed wonderfully, great clear shots and the video quality was excellent. Batteries will last awhile but be aware if you use video feature for too long it will drain rather fast which was expected. This package has everything you need and more. Can't go wrong with this deal at all! I'm happy.

Reviews.Title: *Canon PowerShot A2300 16.0 MP Digital Camera with 5x Digital Image Stabilized Zoom (Silver) + NB-11L Battery + 16GB Deluxe Acce
Reviews.Author: madre42
Reviews.Content: I love this purchase. It is light weight and easy to use. I had purchased another one of the Cannon Cameras separate and loved it so much that I bought this camera and kit. All I can say is that I love it.
